Package imagingbook.lib.util.bits

Class BitVector32

  • java.lang.Object
    • imagingbook.lib.util.bits.BitVector32
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BitVector
    public class BitVector32
extends java.lang.Object
implements BitVector
    This class implements BitVector with internal 32-bit int data.
